leaf.name: leaf
leaf.desc: A leaf lies on the ground.

Closet.name: Closet
Closet.desc: This isn't a very large or clean closet.

door.name: Start Room
door.desc: The door leads back into the room.
door.inspection: The door is plain and wooden.

closet.name: Closet
closet.desc: A closet lies off to the side.
closet.inspection: The door is plain and wooden.

e.name: Next Room
e.desc: There is a pathway to the east.

s.name: Long Hallway
s.desc: There is a hallway to the south.
s.inspection: The hallway seems narrow and foreboding.

iron sword.name: iron sword
iron sword.desc: There is an iron sword on the ground.
iron sword.inspection: The iron sword is of crude workmanship, but it should be usable.

Next Room.name: Next Room
Next Room.desc: You are in the next room over.

w.name: Start Room
w.desc: There is a pathway to the west.
w.inspection: The path expands into a larger room.

troll.name: troll
troll.desc: The troll stands there menacingly with a club.
troll.inspection: The troll is holding a club that is long and made of wood. He appears to be wearing nothing but a loincloth and a leather jerkin.

goblin.name: goblin
goblin.desc: The goblin cowers in a corner holding a knife.
goblin.inspection: The goblin is small, grey, and skinny. He is brandishing a knife.

large red block.name: large red block
large red block.desc: A large red block rests on the ground.
large red block.inspection: Well... it's just a large red block.

Long Hallway.name: Long Hallway
Long Hallway.desc: You are in a long, dark hallway.

n.name: Start Room
n.desc: There is a room to the north
n.inspection: The hallway seems narrow and foreboding.

capsule.name: capsule
capsule.inspection: The capsule appears to be able to hold things.

curious object.name: curious object
curious object.desc: There is a curious object here.
curious object.inspection: The object's appearance confuses your weak mind.
